channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nunu.ai raises $6M for AI agents dubbed ‘unembodied minds’ for game testing
item.description: Nunu.ai has raised $6 million and unveiled Unembodied Minds, or AI agents designed for game testing and to control any given body as needed.

item.description: PlayStation characters may one day engage you in theoretically endless conversations, if a new internal technology video bares out.

item.title: Treasury yields edge up after CPI inflation data comes in cooler than expected
item.description: Bond yields turned higher Wednesday after the consumer-price index report for February came in cooler than Wall Street expected.
